title: newbie request: learning different font types, when not to use certain types, etc.
content:
I am going back to the basics. Although I use fonts everyday, may I ask someone to suggest a tutorial or give a brief explanation on the different font types in the context of graphic production?:  
postscript type1  
true type  
open type

thank you for your suggestions and explanations

 [‹ Tallys](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212541/http:/typophile.com/node/38983 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is the most average typeface ever? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212541/http:/typophile.com/node/39387 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pateeg
